qas.question: What is another name for the Armenian Revolutionary Federation?

answers.text: creating a "free, independent and unified" Armenia

qas.question: Which Dashnak groups helped protect Armenian citizens?

context: During the <a2_0>1890s<a2_0/>, the Armenian Revolutionary Federation, commonly known as <a0_0>Dashnaktsutyun<a0_0/>, became active within the Ottoman Empire with the aim of unifying the various small groups in the empire that were advocating for reform and defending Armenian villages from massacres that were widespread in some of the Armenian-populated areas of the empire. Dashnaktsutyun members also formed <a3_0>fedayi<a3_0/> groups that defended Armenian civilians through armed resistance. The Dashnaks also worked for the wider goal of <a1_0>creating a "free, independent and unified" Armenia<a1_0/>, although they sometimes set aside this goal in favor of a more realistic approach, such as advocating autonomy.
